jacs.utilities

Class AnimatronicsUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • jacs.utilities.AnimatronicsUtilities

  • public class AnimatronicsUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A variety of utilities for converting data types, reading CSV files, procedurally generating motion tracks.
    Author:
    galford

    • Method Detail

      • getBytes

        public static byte[][] getBytes(java.lang.String fileName,
                int numServos)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will take a csv file of servo motions, listed in columns, and put it into a 2D array of bytes
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the input file
        numServos - the number of columns (motors) in the file
        Returns:
        a 2D array of motions, one array per motor
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • readBytesSingleServo

        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
